alert.note: Alert for Guanica; Guayanilla; Yauco (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 08 at 10:58PM ADT until July 09 at 12:15AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Guanica, Guayanilla, Penuelas and Yauco. * WHEN...Until midnight AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 958 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Yauco, Guayanilla, Penuelas, Guanica, Santo Domingo, Tallaboa Alta, Palomas, Indios, Magas Arriba, Maria Antonia, Fuig and Tallaboa. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
